title: Is it possible to get key fragments from ARAM wins?
body: Riot said that you can get key fragments from any matchmade games and I have won 8 ARAM games and haven't got a single one. Is it bugged? or am I getting extremely unlucky, or does Riot mean only Summoners Rift?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Yes it is possible to obtain key fragments from any matchmade queue, however [there is currently a known issue where key fragments are not dropping for anything other than Summoner's Rift](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208184086--March-23-We-re-aware-of-an-issue-where-key-fragments-don-t-drop-properly-outside-of-Summoner-s-Rift-and-we-re-working-on-a-solution-).

This is being looked into and a fix is being worked on.
Oh ok thanks man I guess I'll just stick to Summoners Rift for now?
